name: Looter: Starfighter Arena
description:
Controls: Left mouse, right mouse, left shift, w, i, escape.

Pick up the shiny diamonds, they contain fancy loot.

Firing your weapon generates heat (orange bar). You can hold left shift while shooting to burn through HP if your heat is full.

Damage and Heat use a pseudo-exponential scale where +1 Damage reduces the number of hits to kill by at least 1, and doing 6 more Damage reduces the target's HP by roughly 10 times as much.

There are many many ways this game could be polished more, but instead of doing that I have moved on to Looter 2.
